doc.after: Early estimates on rebuilding the damaged section of the Pentagon were that it would take three years to complete.[83] However, the project moved forward at an accelerated pace and was completed by the one-year anniversary of the attack.[97] The rebuilt section of the Pentagon includes a small indoor memorial and chapel at the point of impact.[98] An outdoor memorial, commissioned by the Pentagon and designed by Julie Beckman and Keith Kaseman, was completed on schedule for its dedication on September 11, 2008.[99]
